item.title: Open kitchen shelves may look great, Marni says, but are they for you?
item.description: I¬†know it‚Äôs tempting. You see those clean, uncluttered open shelves in kitchens, with their matching ceramic dishes, beautifully staged glassware, lots of negative space, and you think, ‚ÄúWhy not? If my kitchen had open shelving, my belongings would look great, too! Plus, everything would be so easy to reach.‚Äù

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: ‚Ü† Popular still-live Prime Day deals worth clicking today
item.description: What day is it? Is it still July? After four product-packed days, we've reached the final countdown:Amazon Prime Day 2025technically endedFriday, July 11, but there are a few still-live deals you can shop. TheUSA TODAY Shopping teamhas been tracking all the most popular price cuts, the deepest discounts and yes, some of the most unexpected finds from the big sale.

item.title: Get free AirPods with Apple‚Äôs 2025 student discount üçé
item.description: Back-to-school season just got a major tech upgrade. Apple has officially launched its2025 back-to-school sale, and it is packed with freebies for college students, parents and educators looking to invest in new tech before the the bell rings on the fall semester.

item.title: Top 5 concerts this week in Sarasota, Manatee counties
item.description: Like many weeksin Julyandthe Sarasota area's off-season, this week's concert picks largely consist of talented musicians who call Florida home. However, we do kick things off with a reggae musician from California, who visits the area while on tour with a group from Maryland.

item.title: Manatee County hosting housing services, legal clinic July 16
item.description: In an effort to makehousing servicesmore accessible to residents experiencing hardship, Manatee County Community Development officials are hosting an information session and legal assistance clinic to help residents with housing support.

item.title: Sarasota, Manatee recreational fishing pros eligible for storm aid
item.description: Suncoast Waterkeeper and Tampa Bay Waterkeeper are teaming up to provide grants up to $1,000 to local recreational fishing professionals impacted byhurricanes Helene and Milton.
